title: Gatsby HiStaff
description: Business ready landing page template for Gatsby.
author: HiStaff

github.readmeContent:
HiStaff Static Website

HiStaff Static is a starter static website which useful plugins based on [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/) . ## üöÄ Quick start 1. **Install the Gatsby CLI.** ```shell npm install -g gatsby-cli ``` 2. **Create a new Gatsby site from HiStaff.** ```sh gatsby new histaff https://github.com/histaff/website-static/ ``` 3. **Start the sites in `develop` mode.** Next, move into your new site‚Äôs directory and start it up: ```sh cd histaff/ gatsby develop ``` 4. **Open the first source code and start editing!** Your site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`. Open the `histaff` directory in your code editor of choice and edit `src/pages/index.js`. Save your changes, and the browser will update in real time! At this point, you‚Äôve got a fully functional Gatsby website. For additional information on how you can customize your Gatsby site, see our [plugins](https://gatsbyjs.org/plugins/) and [the official tutorial](https://gatsbyjs.org/tutorial/). ## üßê Features * Support SCSS * Web font loader (Google and custom font) * Sample pages for starter * Clean code and structure
